definition: to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
Treaty of Saint Petersburg of 1881, whereby Russia handed back Yili province to Qing China in exchange for compensation payment and unequal treaty rights
pinyin: Zhong1 E2 Gai3 ding4 Tiao2 yue1

definition: Treaty of Saint Petersburg of 1881 in which Russia agreed to hand back Yili province to Qing China in exchange for compensation payment and unequal treaty rights
pinyin: Gai3 ding4 Yi1 li2 Tiao2 yue1

sentences.english: They have remade their plans for the summer vacation.
sentences.chinese: 他们已改订了暑期计划。

sentences.english: I guess I'll order the Herald Tribune instead.
sentences.chinese: 我想我可以改订《先驱论坛报》。

sentences.english: I'm sorry to tell you that we have no vacant suites, would you mind order a double room?
sentences.chinese: 我们恐怕没有空余的套间了，您介意改订双人间吗？

sentences.english: We are afraid that there are not any vacant suits available now, do you mind changing to book double rooms?
sentences.chinese: 我们恐怕没有空余的套件了，您介意改订双人间吗？

sentences.english: I'm afraid we have no vacant suits, would you mind order a double room?
sentences.chinese: 我们恐怕没有空余的套房了，您介意改订双人间吗？

sentences.english: I am sorry we do not have enough suite rooms , would mind having a double room instead?
sentences.chinese: 我们恐怕没有空余的套间了，你介意改订双人间吗？

sentences.english: We are afraid that we are fully booked for suites. Would you mind having a double room instead?
sentences.chinese: 我们恐怕没有空余的套间了，你介意改订双人房吗？

sentences.english: I wish I could, but now it appears that they won't be able to come at all.
sentences.chinese: 我希望能改订一下，可是好像他们根本来不了。

sentences.english: We are afraid that there are no spare suites . Would you mind booking a double room ?
sentences.chinese: 我们恐怕没有空余的套房了，您介意改订双人间吗？

sentences.english: I'm afraid we have no available suite, would you mind rewrite twin?
sentences.chinese: 我们恐怕没有空余的套房了，您介意改订双人间吗？

definition: to revise and enlarge (a book)/to augment a purchase order
to go to press/to submit for printing
to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
to lay down (a rule, a plan of action)/to draw up/booked out (i.e. already fully booked)
to repeal (a law)/to put an end to/abolition/annulled
